My introduction to TDD was Martin's Craftsman column which first
appeared i=
n "Embedded Systems."  TDD is explained as a series of stories
about a youn=
g programmer learning the ropes.  These are entertaing,
bite-size packets o=
f instruction useful even to old codgers like me.

The stories are now on-l=
ine at:
